subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Joe Paterno is best known for being Penn State’s coaching icon in black Nike sneakers and chunky glasses. So when he was asked for his take on the presidential election, it might have seemed like a strange question for a college football coach.
snippet: Joe Paterno is best known for being Penn State’s coaching icon in black Nike sneakers and chunky glasses. So when he was asked for his take on the presidential election, it might have seemed like a strange question for a college football coach.
